mapper.select: SELECT KIND_NO kindNo ,DIRECTOR_ID directorId ,REGION_NAME regionName ,KIND_ADDRESS kindAddress ,KIND_NAME kindName ,KIND_CONTACT kindContact ,PLACE_X placeX ,PLACE_Y placeY ,STATUS FROM KINDERGARTEN WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BREED_ID breedId ,PET_NAME petName ,PET_AGE petAge ,PET_GENDER petGender ,WEIGHT weight FROM PET WHERE OWNER_NO = #{ownerNo}
